attributes.additional_details: Some animals die due to fireworks so it’s important that this is taken into consideration
attributes.background: Ban the use of fireworks due to devestating impact  it has on animals

rejection.details:
You might like to sign these petitions:

Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557780

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
